choices: You now have a malleable, squishy body and smell delicious!
You've shrunk to just a few inches!
0.content:
As you read your book about snail facts, your mind frequently wandered. You had an awful feeling that the human child that was briefly in your care was in terrible danger. "No", you said. "I told them I wouldn't follow them." You continued reading, but the feeling of worry and guilt eventually became too much. "Perhaps... I'll just check in on them", you said to yourself as you set the book away and headed off. You walked down the stairs and headed over to the door and walked out of the ruins for the first time in what felt like an eternity. You were extremely unfamiliar with your new surroundings, but you focused on finding the child, wherever they may be. Just as you had reached a waterfall, your entire body was quickly covered in long, thick vines. You gasped as you struggled in vain against your binds, but it proved to be futile.

"Howdy, Boss Lady", said a familiar voice. Your eyes widened and your brow furrowed in anger as the cruel flower from earlier popped out of the ground. You thought you had disposed of him earlier when you caught him bullying that poor child, but it seemed that he had stuck around. "You really got me good back there, y'know?"

"You! What have you done to the child?!", you yelled as you attempted to free yourself with fire magic.

"Oh, I haven't done anything to them... yet", the sadistic plant laughed. "Don't get me wrong, I got loads of plans for the little brat. Buuut... I just know that you're gonna get in my way. I'm right, aren't I?"

"You leave that poor child alone!", you cried.

"Well, lucky for you, I have to test out my new trick before I use it on them", Flowey said. "And you're just the guinea pig to help me out!" With that, Flowey sent a powerful surge of energy through his vines and into you. You screamed out as the energy covered you, your body absorbing it and causing you to feel an extremely odd pain. Once he was finished, he unwrapped his vines and allowed you to fall limply to the ground. He looked over at you and grinned at his handiwork. "Hahaha! It worked!", Flowey laughed. "Now to go use it on that little goody-goody. Maybe I'll come back to check on you later", he said as he popped back into the ground.

After around ten minutes, you woke up and shook your head. "*groan* What happened?", you said as you held your hand to your head. After looking at your hand and at your surroundings, you gasp in horror. "Th-that awful flower...", you stammer in horror. "What has he done to me?"
0.title: Fun with Toriel

02.content:
You thought for a moment that revolting weed had simply messed with your vision (something that could be easily remedied), but looking back at your hand and your surroundings, it was clear that your condition was much worse. Your arm, and the rest of your body, were wobbling as if they were made of dough or jelly. On top of that, you noticed the most delicious smell of butterscotch-cinnamon emanating from your hand. It was reasonable to assume that this was Flowey's doing as well, as it had been several hours since you had baked your pie.

"I'm... I'm made of pie filling?!", you screamed. This was a horrifying fate, one that you wish on anyone. You were little more than a walking snack now, and it likely wouldn't take much for you to be splattered into paste or smeared across a surface, that's not even taking into account what the temperatures of Snowdin and Hotland could do to you. "I should stay here and see if I can somehow reverse this... Perhaps the human can take care of themselves until I-"

You stopped yourself mid-sentence and grimaced, disgusted by the words coming out of your own mouth. "What am I saying? I can't allow that awful plant do anything like this to an innocent child." Mustering up all of your courage, you decided to do whatever it took to find the human and keep this from happening to them, regardless of the risk to your own life.

Having lived much longer than most other monsters, you knew every short cut there was to be found, and all of them had secret pathways leading out of the ruins. They were made with the intention of monsters avoiding areas that are inhospitable for them, but they're mostly used by spiders now.

You knew that the human had to get through Snowdin first, but that was a while ago. They would likely be around the Waterfall or Hotland by now. Unless Flowey had gotten to them, that is. If he had done something similar to the human, they could be frozen solid and defenseless!
Or perhaps you should wait further down and see if they arrive. There was no telling where Flowey would strike, maybe allowing the human to believe they were at the end of their journey before they struck. In that case, it would be wise to get to that area before Flowey to both ensure the human's safety, and try to restore yourself. Of course, you weren't thrilled at the idea of meeting your ex-husband. You still haven't forgiven him for what he did all those years ago. But that was something you would have to mentally prepare for.

You didn't have much time to waste. Something could be happening to the human right now!

Thinking only of the safety of the human, you ran as quickly as you could through the passage leading to...
02.title: Aren't you sweet?

choices: Toriel gets broken apart and stuffed in a bag.
Toriel gets brought back to the shopkeer's shop in one piece.
021.content:
... Snowdin! The cold, snow-covered town would surely be the first stop of the human's journey. If I was fast she could catch up with them, though I had to move quickly. Unfortunately for me my jelly-like body wobbled vigorously every time I tried to run. The intense cold made things even worse as little by little I slowed down, though I was too focused on finding the child to really care.

I pressed on, trudging through the forest and eventually ending up in a vast field of snow. The lights of the snowy town appeared in the distance as I kept going. It wasn't clear at first that my gelatinous body was slowly freezing in the frigid cold, my feet already frozen solid as I hurried desperately toward Snowdin. Once my legs were frozen I took notice, having to waddle as if my legs were made of stone. Next my arms froze, stuck at my sides as my pace slowed to a crawl. I hopped as quickly as I could, trying hard not to fall over. My head froze as well, leaving me unable to even look around, a terrified expression stuck on my face.

Eventually I froze completely, unable to so much as wiggle as I stood there. I looked more like a statue than a person now, not even able to move my eyes to see if anyone was around to help. Luckily for me there actually was someone around to help! Far off in the distance there was a purple bunny girl collecting snow, probably to make popsicles for her shop. I don't know how long I stood there helplessly, though the strong scent of cinnamon and butterscotch drew the rabbit over eventually.

Oh thank goodness, I thought to myself, I'm going to be brought into town!

The bunny looked me up and down, giving me a few curious pokes. After that she pulled off my clothes and blushed as she found the 'sculpture' to be completely anatomically correct. I would have been blushing intensely if she still could, though it was far too cold for a semi-liquid creature like me to do such a thing. No blush appeared even once the bunny started rubbing curiously at my vagina.

"Jeez, what kinda pervert would make this thing so lifelike?" The bunny girl asked herself out loud.

Because I am alive! S-Stop touching me there!! I silently responded internally, though there was no way to communicate while I was stuck like that. I was relieved when the bunny shrugged and finally stopped poking my sex, though that relief was short-lived once she dug an ice pick out of her bag. The bunny was getting ready to carve me up and bake me into cinnamon rolls!
021.title: Off to Snowdin

choices: ...being poured into a bowl, an oven being preheated heard
...onto a counter, it seems you were recognized after all
...somewhere unfamiliar. Someone else must have gotten the bag
0211.content:
You could only scream out in your mind as the petite bunny girl approached you, ice pick in hand. You didn't have to wait long for it to start, since as soon as she got close enough, you could see her drive the ice pick right into your right horn and break it clean off!

AH! You cry out, despite it not hurting. As it was being stuffed into the small sacks he brought with her, you noticed you could still feel that part inside of the bag, as if it wasn't torn off at all. You didn't have much time to think of it though, as the ice pick swung at you again. This time, taking you entire ear off.

At this point, you pieced together that, in this form, simply being torn up wouldn't be enough to kill you, but that'd just mean, when the baking time came, you'd be alive to experience it! However, you didn't have much time to think about it as you felt the chisel break off your other ear, then you're arm, then a large portion of your beast, each of them coming off as it you were nothing more than a block of ice

After what was likely a half hour, but felt like an eternity, of chiseling, you felt the last part of yourself, about half of your head, the only part out. But that swiftly changed when she picked it up and stuffed it in there, your vision of the outside world suddenly replaced with the inside view of the bag, surrounded by your frozen, broken off parts.

You could only whimper in your head as you felt the sleigh moving. Now that you were broken up, it was even less likely someone would come to save you, and you were about to be transformed into a very nice, baked good.

You didn't have much time to wonder what it'd be like though, because, before you know it, the bag you were in was dumped out, you falling out only to find yourself...
0211.title: Toriel gets broken apart and stuffed in a bag.

choices: You manage to shake your body, making the bunny confused
you can't move and several customers enter the bakery
you can't move, but the bunny is eating you all herself!
02111.content:
You were not liking the situation you were in now, had she just let you be for a few hours then maybe you would have been able to move again but sadly this would not be the case. The bunny girl simply took all of your body and was mashing them into tiny bits to melt faster, you could feel the process like a full body massage as it didn't exactly hurt you but you still wanted to yelp in fear as she smashed your face and started kneading you into the bowl like dough. Her warm hands mooshed your face but you couldn't find it in yourself to be angry or scared with the joyful look she was giving your small form.

After this she began whisking ingredients together and then pressing you flat onto a pan, the cinnamon and butter she washed over you was delightful but then you were pushed into an oven! the heat slowly enveloped you and while it wasn't burning just yet you could feel your body expanding as though it were a pastry as she had thought you were. From the oven you watched the bunny baker wiggle around the room until she came back over for you. You felt fuller than before as if all parts of your body had grown inside the oven and the icy coldness of the room wafted onto you after so long in the heat. Steam still rising you cold see what you had been made into. Several trays of cinnimon rolls were laid out on the cooling rack and you could feel all of them! you watched as the adorable rabbit girl lifted one of the gooy buns that because of it's sensitivity you realized was one of your breasts. She blew on it causing you to shiver a bit before shoving the whole thing into her mouth.

If you could have yelped you would have, you could feel the teeth turning your boob into mush but instead of pain all it brought was the pleasant massaging feeling again. as nice as it felt you still didn't want to be eaten! you had to get moving to show her you were alive!
02111.title: Mixed up

choices: Toriel gets left outside for everyone to grope and gawk at.
The group carry Toriel into the hot, toasty shop.
Toriel falls over and slams into the wall, shattering.
0212.content:
I stood there for what felt like hours as the rabbit girl appraised me, looking for the perfect spot to start hacking me to pieces. After a couple minutes she just put the pick away and instead opted to shove me onto her sled and start hauling me back home. Her strength was very impressive, though even with a sled she still had a hard time getting me all the way back. Still, I was very happy not to be left helpless and far away from civilization. In fact I was so relieved that I hadn't even thought of my new predicament until I saw the townsfolk staring at me: I was still totally naked! My clothes were left somewhere out in the frozen field, leaving me completely exposed.

I could practically feel everyone watching me, staring at my every inch of exposed fur. My vision shook around as I helplessly stared upward, every part of me still stuck as if frozen in time. Every person she walked past gawked at me, each of them having their own reaction to the unusual and erotic sight. Some reacted with joy at the sight, laughing at me and giving me a grope. Others recoiled in horror at the shopkeeper parading around with what was ostensibly a piece of pornography. One woman, a mother, was so disgusted that she immediately scurried off with her children as the kids peeked around their mother at me, energetically chatting back and forth while their mom tried to keep them from looking.

In that moment I couldn't help but feel that being smashed apart and stuffed in a bag might not have been so bad if it spared me the humiliation of being carried around as a perverted art piece. The worst part was when she propped me up in front of her shop. She wasn't even going to bring me inside!? At that point I really wanted to scream, to flail around, to do anything to spare me the embarrassment of being a nude ice sculpture. Unfortunately for me it just wasn't meant to be. A small crowd of 6 or 7 monsters gathered around while the bunny wiped sweat from her brow and stood next to me triumphantly.
0212.title: Toriel gets brought back to the shop

choices: Baking time with Toriel as an ingredient.
02122.content:
"Alright everybody, help me drag this thing inside!" The shopkeeper said, gingerly lowering me onto my back. "But it's gonna melt!" One of the monsters chimed in, distraught that such a nice sculpture was going to be destroyed. "Yeah, well, I've got some ideas on what to do with it after it's liquid. Plus I don't think some of the folks around here would appreciate an 8 foot tall statue of a naked lady." The bunny girl responded, though she did look a little guilty that she was going to melt down such a lifelike piece of art.

She didn't feel guilty enough not to drag me inside and place me next to the fire though. "Hey, hold it there for a sec." She said, scurrying off into the back room and returning with a metal tub big enough for me to stand in. I couldn't help but feel a little offended as the group panted and grunted while trying to lift me high enough to set in the tub. I'm not that big! ... Ok, well, I am pretty big. Still, they eventually managed to set me down in the tub, my body already starting to drip into it. Being so close to the roaring fireplace was uncomfortable but at least I couldn't be burned in my current state.

I can finally thaw out and go back to searching for the child! I thought to myself as the monsters filed out and the shopkeeper went back into her back room. The fire was so hot that I actually started to melt, but I didn't think it was going to be a problem until my head suddenly fell off and plopped into the tub. That was somewhat concerning. It was even more concerning when more of me crumbled and splashed down into the pool quickly forming in the tub, my body falling apart before my eyes and melting in the hot liquid that was now me.

To say it was a bizarre feeling would be an understatement. I was breaking apart and melting right then and there, my body quickly turning into nothing but a pale white sludge with no features at all. Within minutes there was nothing solid left of me, just a pool of cinnamon-butterscotch scented liquid nestled in a hot steel tub. I should have been terrified but it was actually quite relaxing; all the tension in my body was gone, literally! I tried my hardest to reform but it was no good, I was too hot to make myself solid at all. All I could do was sit there in the tub and patiently wait for more misfortunes to befall me.
02122.title: The group carry Toriel into the hot, toasty shop.

choices: None other than Asgore comes in and buys Toriel!
021221.content:
I sat there in the tub for what felt like hours, but it was probably closer to just 10 minutes. The feeling of my body bubbling and boiling but feeling no pain was extremely strange, not to mention the fact that I was now totally liquid. The shopkeeper eventually came back with a pair of oven mitts and grabbed ahold of my tub before dragging me away to the back room.

I couldn't see much since I was still stuck, but I caught a brief glimpse of a single glass jug. Surely she couldn't store all of me in such a tiny space?. The thought of being bottled up would have made me sick to my stomach if I still had one. She didn't go about storing me right away though. Instead she sat around a while and waited for me to cool a bit.

My body was still pretty hot, too hot for me to reform, but I'd cooled enough that she could now stick her fingers into me and test my taste. I couldn't quite see her but I could tell she was definitely tasting me because I could feel her licking me off her fingers! The feeling was actually kind of nice, though I was a little unnerved after she swallowed that little bit of me and digested it almost instantly. If she kept eating me I might just disappear forever!

Unfortunately I must have been delicious because she couldn't restrain herself. She scooped out another handful of me and drank me down. Then another, and another, and another. The bunny was greedily snarfing down my tasty liquefied form bit by bit! I could feel myself shrinking as more of myself was split away and got processed by her stomach. By the time she reigned in her hunger she'd gotten a round and jiggly belly that poked out from under her shirt.

By then there was far less of me. So little of me in fact that all she had to do was tip over the tub and dump me into a funnel, neatly storing me in a single two-gallon jug. There was only two gallons of me left! Barely anything! The shopkeeper's big purple belly sloshed loudly as she carried my jug back out into the shop and placed me on the counter, scribbling a price tag on a piece of tape and sticking it on. Hopefully I'd be bought soon; I don't want to end up as a bunny's dinner!
021221.title: Toriel gets bottled and sold.

choices: "This looks simply delicious" (doesn't recognize you - vore time)
"This reminds me of someone" (might recognize you?)
"I know someone who would love this" (giving to someone else)
0212211.content:
After what felt like hours and hours of waiting, looking through the slightly foggy glass you were in, you began getting paranoid. that is until, you heard the bell by the door ring as you saw someone come in. Given how foggy it was, you could only make out a blurry, tall, white figure.

"Oh, Mr. Dreemurr, welcome" you heard the bunny cry out in shocj

"Good evening, Miss. I've heard you just got something interesting in?" The Goat King inquiried

Given how she addressed him and the voice, you could tell who it was and you mentally groaned in disgust. Your ex-husband, Asgore. If you could, you would be trying to get away even further now, but no solid mouth meant no way of talking, and that was assuming you're mouth wasn't in the part that was consumed by the shopkeeper. Thus, you were helpless as he suddenly picked up the jar you were in with a bit of strength, you're insides sloshing around.

"Now what is this odd liquid?" he asked the shopkeep

"Oh, I melted down this ice statue of a goat lady. It has to be something beside water, though. It tastes great"

He clearly raised an eyebrow at that, but simply shrugged, "I'll take it"

You gulped mentally as you could see them exchange money. At least you were out of that bunny gal's hands but now you were in the ones of your ex-husband. Better than being eaten completely. You thought as he suddenly popped the cap off, taking a deep whiff of you and sighing in what appeared to be delight.

He took another look at you, his face practically right up in your face before he suddenly said
0212211.title: None other than Asgore comes in and buys Toriel!

choices: A blue fish girl buys you.
You're purchased by a black and white dog in a pink tank top.
No one buys you. Time for dinner...
0212212.content: Does someone else buy the jug of liquid Toriel?
0212212.title: Reader's choice.

choices: Toriel is digested into living fat.
02122124.content:
Although I feared the idea of being bought by someone and used for things I don't even want to think about, the full jiggling belly of the shopkeeper reminded me what would become of my fate if I wasn't purchased. I still couldn't believe that most of my body had been eaten! If somebody didn't buy me, I could join the rest of my body gurgling away in the purple bunny's stomach! I tried with all my might to move around and get someone's attention every time a monster entered the shop, but none of them were interested in the jug of white liquid with the eyes. I couldn't believe that I was hoping to be purchased, but hearing the gurgles of the plump purple bunny's belly and seeing though the glass of the jug as she licked her lips put enough fear into me to want as far away from here as possible. As each minute passed, I began to lose hope, until it was time for the shopkeeper to close up for the day, and my fate was sealed.

"I was sort of hoping no one would buy you", the shopkeeper said as she ripped the price tag off and grabbed my container. I mentally wept as I was carried over to a table along with a glass and the purple bunny sat down. I could now see that her belly didn't look as full, but still kept much of it's roundness. I could almost feel the jiggling as she took a seat and popped the cork off of my container.
"Now let's finish the rest of this tasty cider", she said to herself as she poured out some of my liquid body into the glass. It admittedly felt a little nice running down her tongue and down her throat. Perhaps it was my mind trying to keep from being afraid of what was going to happen to me. I felt a familiar tingling sensation as the part of my body was dissolved inside her stomach, which grew as she downed the glass. Once she had finished, she licked her lips.
"Mmmm-mmm. Delicious! Think I'll have another-" The shopkeeper tilted my jug, going to pour another glass, but stopped herself. "Eh, to hell with it." The purple bunny pushed the glass aside and put her lips to the jug, quickly and greedily chugging my liquid form!

I tried my best to let out a scream, but that did no good as i poured down the bunny girl's throat. A loud *GLUG* *GLUG* *GLUG* could be heard as she slurped up the delicious "cider". As I drained into the shopkeeper's stomach, I mentally cursed the awful flower for my plight. I should have toasted that despicable weed when it first threatened the child. Then maybe this wouldn't be happening. Soon, the jug had been emptied and I had completely drained into my new fleshy enclosure.
She let out a rather loud belch and patted her belly, causing me to slosh around inside. "Excuse me", she said as she licked her lips. "I kind of regret not keeping some of that cider for later", the shopkeeper said, "But that was just too sweet to just leave lying around."

Inside the bunny woman's gut, I mentally cry out as the digestive juices begin to break down my body. "This can't be the end", I thought. "I won't allow myself to perish! Not like this!"

It was true, I was not going to die on this day... although there are things more humiliating than death inside a stomach.
02122124.title: Tasty Toriel Cider

choices: Stay on her belly as sentient fat
021221242.content:
Being digested alive was not fun. At least Toriel didn't feel any sort of pain, she was just kind of, absorbed straight into the bunny woman's gut, making the already notable weight gain stick out even more. Toriel felt more solid in this form, even if she was trapped on the purple bunny's abdomen.

Trying to move around, all she accomplished was to make the remaining chunks of her that were digested earlier to accumulate around her. There wasn't much else to do however...

Despite having drunk all 2 gallons of the "cider", the bunny didn't feel full at all "Still not full? I thought it would be enough. Might as well have some dinner and be done with it for the night." The bunny went to the back, getting some of the raw dough for tomorrow and began baking it. About an hour later, it was ready, and despite being just fat, Toriel almost swore she could smell the flaky butter that covered the buns. Giving it about 5 minutes to cool, the bunny final picked one up and began to eat.

As soon as the first bite of bread entered the bunny's stomach, Toriel felt a tug, pulling her attention towards the chewed bread. It was slowly digesting, unlike her essence, which turned into fat almost immediately. This piled up over time in a pool of digestive acid, slowly but surely filling up the stomach. At the halfway point, it occurred to Toriel that perhaps she should attempt something. And that something she did.

The mushy stewing pile almost immediately broke down into fat, joining her in the bunny's belly. She felt, bigger somehow. Perhaps the digested hot buns were now part of her body. Or maybe just because she was actually able to do something. Nevertheless, her actions were noticed.

"Did the cider make me hungrier than usual? Usually I'm beyond stuffed at this point" The bunny pats her gut, feeling all of Toriel, yet not realizing a thing. "I was planning to save these for later, but oh well. I am still hungry after all" She grabbed the remaining hot buns, stuffing them into her mouth without a care for how many she swallowed. Keeping up with her pace was Toriel, immediately forcing the buns to digest into fat. It was a close race, but eventually, the bunny ate the entire tray, about 60 in total. And yet, she still felt hungry. Looking at her to waistline only aggravated her more, seeing as her previously manageable bump of a belly had completely transformed into a massive accumulation of useless fatty fur, which unbeknownst to her was actually Toriel "Why did this happen!" Frustrated, she gave up on having dinner and went to bed, leaving the sentient accumulation of fat previously known as Toriel to contemplate her current situation.
021221242.title: Chubby Bunny's Belly

choices: Search for the child in Waterfall
Try looking for the child in Hotland
0212212421.content:
Once the purple chubby bunny was fully asleep, Toriel made her move, the huge belly that the bunny was carrying began to twitch, then move in a coordinated manner, slowly shrinking as the fat began escaping from the belly and through the bunny's system. Thankfully, she managed to escape through her behind without any accidental digestion occurring, slowly escaping the bunny's anus as a lardy mess.

She piled up at the foot of the bed, leaving any partially digested parts on the bed as well as anything that wasn't a part of her. Once all of her mass was accumulated, and it was a rather large amount, she began shifting towards the door, hoping to reach the bathroom and possibly reassemble herself.

It took what felt like hours, although it was really just a half hour, but she remade herself, albeit with some... Additions to her figure. From instantly digesting the hot buns the bunny made, she had gained more mass. It was useful to replace any missing pieces from her, but alas, it was an overly excessive amount. Her previously apple shaped figure had swollen to an orange, and a huge one at that. Her belly was sagging onto her thunder thighs, not that she minded, seeing as it hid her vagina from public view, but how could she find her child like this? Her condition was at least better than being pie filling, as that was notably easier to melt and freeze. And in this form, she could actually afford to lose a chunk of herself, unlike her last one.

Curious, she licked the inside of her mouth. She still had the lingering aftertaste of cinnamon and butterscotch, but it was mostly replaced with sweet fat, as if she were made of sugared butter, except much more solid. Still, she couldn't expect her body to hold up well in near a heat source. Escaping the house was easy, after she greased open the door. Now, where should she go next...
0212212421.title: Living as Fat

choices: Toriel manages to escape past Flowey
Flowey tries to roll Toriel into a ball
025.content:
You ran as fast as you could down the passage, in the direction you were sure the human ran off to. You were sure that malicious flower was after them again! Little did you know how far from the truth that was…

You continued running, eyes straight ahead. However, you heard a noise overhead.

“Look out below, idiot!” that familiar, weed-y voice said. However, faster than you could respond to it, you felt two smooth, ball-like things slip around the side of your head. And, just like that, you were thrust into darkness, unable to see anything, and the feeling of your whole head being squished up. You had no idea what just happened, and began patting around your head, trying to make sure you weren’t just imagining the squeezing around your head…

Any onlooker, meanwhile, would’ve seen the pear-shaped flower punk falling butt first upon you, right before his buttcheeks slipped right around your head, partially cramming your head up his rump. Unfortunately for the flower, he seemed a might small for you, so instead of squashing all of you (because he landed juuuuust right around your head), or sucking you up into his rear chamber, your body scrunched downwards a little, before expanding upwards like an accordion. Flowey, meanwhile seemed a bit pained, not expecting the feeling of your relatively large head partway up his rump. Meanwhile, you curiously patted around your head, only feeling his plant tush.

“Not… exactly what I was going for…” Flowey admitted. However, he wouldn’t let this be the end of him. He planted his leaf-like feet on your shoulders, and jumped forwards, intent on popping off of your shoulders. However, you were crammed up just far enough for him to instead yank your stretchy body downwards. Your neck was stretched thin as your head remained between his cheeks. Flowey looked back, realizing you were kind of stuck. As painful as he initially felt, he couldn’t help but let out a grin.

He then squatted, making sure to angle his backside such that it was pointed towards the rest of your body. He giggled to himself at the downright juvenile attack he was about to pull on you. Then, with a grunt, you felt the walls around your head clench tighter, squeezing your squishy head even more so. But that wouldn’t be for long, for, with a thunderous noise, your whole head was launched outwards, alongside a cloud of pollen, as your elastic neck snapped your head towards the rest of your body as if a rubber band was stretched and then released. The force of the gastrointestinal push left you dizzy as your head was launched backwards a little, until it was snapped back.

However, a malicious laughter brought you back to your senses. You were finally able to look down and see who was likely the cause for your confusion squeeze. It had the head of that flower creep from before, but it also bore a set of arms, legs, and a pear-shaped body, along with a prominent posterior for one of his size. Your brow furrowed with anger as the laughing creep stood before you, who’d began tauntingly wagging his butt in front of you.

“Bet ya think you’re real special cause you survived a trip up there, don’t ya?” he asked. You were confused at first, but as Flowey put a little more oomph into his taunting butt-shake, you began to put 2 and 2 together. You blushed, both embarrassed and horrified at what that monster was implying. “Well, let’s say I don’t let stuff like size stop me! Yeah, all I have to do is get a better angle on you, sit on you a couple times until you’re nice and flat, then, when you’re too small to fight back, then I’ll play with you, until I finish you off!”

You felt anger rise from within your chest, wanting so badly to stop this punk right here, right now before he could mess up that human! But, Flowey seemed intent on keeping that butt waving in front of you, wanting to make sure you remember just where you’d end up by the end of this.
025.title: Flowey blocks your path.

03.content:
As you looked around, you began to notice something was off. You ordinarily towered over the stuff in the ruins, but not now. Everything towered over you, from the flowers to the tiny monsters. You weren't sure if you could protect anyone or tend to any ruins being this small. You needed to find that dreadful weed and convince him to undo whatever he just did to you.

You walked out the door, which took a lot longer than it normally should, considering your size. As you walked, you began to consider how you could possibly find him. He fled through the soil, so he could be anywhere there was dirt. Then you remembered, he was looking for the human. If you find them, you'll likely find the plant. The human was most likely heading towards Asgore, you'd have to go through Snowdin to get there, so you ran towards it.

As you ran...
03.title: You've shrunk to just a few inches!

04.content:
You stood up, still trying to discern what that flower did to you. You looked at your hands, your legs, your whole body. Nothing seemed to change about you physically. You had all of your limbs, you appeared to be just as big as before, you couldn't see any changes. Your thoughts were suddenly interrupted by a growl from your stomach. At that moment, you realized you were hungry. You doubted this hunger was the flower's doing. Suddenly, you heard something come in from behind.

Unbeknownst to you, a Froggit had found its way into your home, and was traveling through it. Eventually, it found its way downstairs, and out the back, and stumbled onto you, struggling to get your bearings. It croaked to try and get your attention. You turned around, and were thankful to hear no difference to your movement. You didn't see anything, until you looked downwards. You were typically much taller than the residents of the ruins, but you don't remember seeing this resident.

Standing in front of you was, of all things, a snail! This snail was larger than normal, but a snail was a snail. That was what your stomach said as it growled at you again while you looked down at the snail. You planted a hand on your stomach, noting how empty it felt. You turned your attention towards the snail, and decided you needed to tend to this hunger.

"You came at just the right time," you said as you reached down towards the snail. The Froggit, who looked a lot more snail-like to you, seemed confused at your statement. It tilted its head as your hand reached down to it. Your fingers wrapped around its midsection, and gently lifted it up level to your head. "Down the hatch!" you cooed. You opened your mouth wide and closed your eyes to enjoy the meal. Then, the Froggit began to panic.

You felt the snail flail about in your grip, though its attempts at escape were halted by your grip. You heard it cry and squeal with fear as you brought it close. You plopped it into your maw, you tongue already working to taste the snail. The Froggit tried to crawl out of your mouth, but your jaws were shut too tight for it to move anywhere. It was crying as you tasted it. After enough tasting, you lifted your head, and swallowed. The snail traveled down your throat, creating a noticeable bulge that disappeared behind your chest and into your stomach. You patted your gut and sighed with content. The Froggit, meanwhile, frantically beat against the inside of your stomach, crying for freedom.

"Yum!" you remarked before licking your lips. As you sucked the taste off of each of your finger tips, any fear about what Flowey did to you disappeared. Flowey intended to make you hallucinate to see danger as safe, and vice versa, but he didn't account for the magic present in your body. The resulting magic altered Flowey's spell, and now you see various monsters as snails, not that you realized that yet. After you finished tasting the remnants of that snail, you decided you needed to continue to find that human. Flowey said he was after them, and you wouldn't dare let that creep displace a single hair on their head.

Now, all you have to do is find out where that human was.
04.title: You begin to hallucinate [reserved]

choices: ...you reach the village in little time
041.content: You decided to head to Snowdin. After all, that was the next place on the path after your house. You marched through the snowy path, patting your belly full of snail. You were awfully thankful that one happened to hop up next to you. You kept marching towards the village. You haven't been around here much. As you continued...
041.title: You start searching in Snowdin

choices: You head out of the town
0413.content:
Eventually, you made it to Snowdin. It was small, and showed some quaint houses and various animal-like monsters walking about. You were sure that child must be somewhere around here. However, as you considered that, you saw something peculiar. A snail walking another snail with a leash. The snail on the leash is smaller than the one walking them. You saw the pair walk towards a rear path.

You weren't hungry, but snails were always nice.
0413.title: ...you reach the village in little time

04131.content:
You began to salivate. You followed the duo to the back, licking your lips. Suddenly, you felt a little hungrier. The duo stopped in the middle of the path. Near them, there was a bunny looking on in confusion at the two. You began to creep up on the two. The one holding the leash turned towards you. Unbeknownst to you, the rabbit walking her brother on a leash was looking on you with confusion.

"P-please hold still for a moment," you said. You wrapped your hands around her shoulders, which made the rabbit start to get fearful. Which only grew when you lifted her up, and opened your mouth wide. She began kicking and screaming, and the rabbit that looked at the two was looking on in fear. You then jammed her head between your lips, and her screaming was muffled. You licked at the snail within your maw, and let out an "mmm" of content. The rabbit, meanwhile, was crying.

You then began swallowing her. She created a large bulge in your throat, and kept assaulting her with your tongue. Due to her size, it took you a couple of gulps to swallow her. In little time, she disappeared down your throat, and filled up your gut. However, you still felt something poke out of your mouth. You reached for whatever was hanging out of it, and realized it was the leash, which still held the smaller snail. You then sighed, and began slurping the leash. The smaller snail began screaming and pulling at the snow to keep away from you.

A few quick slurps pulled the snail into your maw, who was practically bite sized. You tasted this one, and swallowed him in a single gulp. You sighed in content and rubbed your gut. You then let out a small belch, and blushed. You turned towards the on looking rabbit, and he practically fainted.

"Oh dear, I'm sorry!" you said to him. You decided that you spent to much time gorging yourself. You needed to find that child.
04131.title: You follow the snails

choices: It appears to be a snail wearing an eyepatch
041313.content:
Apparently, someone saw you eating those two, and didn't faint out of shock. The librarian was passing by, and noticed you eating a couple of rabbits. Out of fear, she ran to Papyrus, the closest thing Snowdin had to a royal guard. However, upon being told that this creature was eating monsters, Papyrus grew fearful, and "heroically ran off to gather reinforcements.

Meanwhile, you were leaving the alleyway, inserting each of your fingertips into your mouth before popping them out. However, your stroll was interrupted by a boisterous "NGAAAH!" The snow in front of you was kicked up in a flurry in front of your face, like something struck it with extreme force. The fog of snow cleared up, and you saw the cause of the strike.

1.content:
[writer's note: I will remove the link to the image if asked by the artist]

Your name is Frisk. You are a young child of indeterminate gender who has wandered up into Mt. Ebott and fallen into the chasm inside for reason known only to yourself. Your determination has allowed you to have a certain amount of control over the flow of time. You've SAVED and gone through the underground more times than you can count. However, you often felt the influence of a malevolent force controlling your actions every now and then, making you do things you can't bear to think about. This time will be different, you think to yourself. Nothing is going to control you now. This time, you will save the underworld for good. At least, that's what you hope.

You were surprised to find that Flowey, a being that had quickly become the bane of your existence, was nowhere to be found from where you first fell down again. By now, you had gotten a good way into your journey, and it was odd that he hadn't shown up yet. You didn't even catch a sight of him sneaking behind you as he often did. This wasn't normal, but you had figured that, since he also had knowledge of RESETS and SAVES, that it might be because he knows you won't fall for his tricks. You knew that you'd inevitably run into him after getting to the barrier, so you weren't too worried. Nothing he did surprised you anymore.

Having just saved Undyne from heat death, you had decided to head back and try to befriend her. As you walked through the seaweed, a thick vine suddenly wrapped itself around your entire body, holding you firmly in place!

"Howdy!"

You groaned as you heard that familiar high-pitched voice. You didn't think he would turn up this soon.

"Heya buddy", Flowey greeted. "Looks like you're a little stuck there", he said, feigning concern as you struggled against your binds. "Betcha didn't expect to see me here, huh?" He continued. "Now, we've been doing this for a while now, and by now you probably think you've got everything figured out."

You tried to scream out, hoping maybe your arm-less monster friend was still nearby, but no sound came out.

"And you know what? I'm pretty sick of going through the motions. Picking on you when you fall down, killing Asgore, becoming a god and all that", Flowey continued. "So, I decided to change things up a little", he said, tightening his grip on you. "Instead of messing with you at the entrance and watching your every move, I've been using my time to work on something special for ya." With that, he stuck his tongue out and winked as a surge of energy flowed through the vine and into your body, giving you an incredibly painful experience. More vines wrapped around you, seeming to drain your energy and replacing it with... something else. Your mind nearly went blank when your binds were finally unwrapped. Once they returned to the ground, you fell limp to the ground as the world was spinning around you.

Flowey laughed as you struggled to return to your feet. "You really are an idiot!", he laughed maniacally as two leaves sprouted from the sides of him. "I bet you don't even know what I just did, but I'll give you a moment to guess", Flowey said before pausing. "Nope? Nothin'? Well I'll just tell you. I just drained away some of your DETERMINATION. Not all of it, but just enough to give me control of the timeline again", he said, laughing. "And a little extra to give me this..." With that, the two leaves on the sides of Flowey pushed down on the ground and he popped out of the ground, revealing that he had gained a pear-shaped body, as well as a set of arms and legs, along with a rather... generously sized behind. (though he was still about half your size)
[pic for reference: https://e621.net/post/show/1252260 ]

"Pretty jealous, huh?", he said, walking up to you with a confident stride. "But don't worry, I gave something to you in return. In addition to draining your DETERMINATION, I went ahead and changed your body's makeup for ya. That ought to make things way more fun. In fact, I think I'm gonna have some fun with you right now..." Flowey licked his lips as he walked closer to you, clearly having ill intentions.

You didn't want to wait to see what the sadistic flower had in mind. Not even thinking about what happened to your body, you got up and ran as fast as you could, trying to get as far away from your attacker as possible.

"Aww, come on, buddy. You're not being a very good friend, ya know", he said as he slowly walked to your direction. He wasn't in a hurry to catch you. He had control over the timeline again, after all. You were basically already his.

You eventually grew tired of running and found a group of echo flowers to hide in. Now having a chance to catch your breath, you examined your self to see what he meant about altering your body's makeup. To your horror, you found that...
1.title: Stay Determined

11.content:
You pressed into your sides to find that your hands went rather deep into your body, enough that you were able to touch your other hand. Pulling your arms out of your body, you had figured that awful talking weed had made you into some kind of jelly person.

"Where are ya, buddy? I'm getting pretty tired of walking", Flowey called out. "You like helping people out, right? I could use a seat cushion", he laughed as he gave his new plump behind a slap.

You shuddered at the thought of getting smushed beneath him. Filled with terror, you thought about what you should do. Dr. Alphys was up ahead. Maybe she could help you with your new problem. You'd at least be safe in her lab.
Undyne could probably provide you with protection. Though, you still hadn't made friends with her yet. An encounter with her may not end well.
Of course, you could always seek shelter with Toriel. She said that she didn't want you coming back, but hearing about your situation may change her mind.

You had to think quickly, otherwise you were gonna get squashed!

What happens?
11.title: Squishy Frisk

choices: You fall for his trap. (Squashed by Flowey.)
You fall for his trap. (Shoved into Flowey's mouth.)
You see someone else in Flowey's place.
111.content:
"Gotcha!", you heard Flowey yell above you. You look up and your entire being is filled with panic. Flowey had apparently been standing on the ledge above you, as you're forced to watch the rapidly descent of the flower's bulbous green behind. You manage to scuttle out of the way as he slams his plump rear on the ground, squashing an echo flower in the process. "Haha, just think, that could be you", Flowey laughs as he stands up and gives his rear another slap.

You stumble over your own feet a few times as you run away, attempting to seek shelter from Flowey. As you attempt to get away, you run into a wall as you round the corner. You thought you would have splattered, but you managed to squeeze into a crack in the wall. How fortunate! You decide that this is the best place to hide until the coast is clear and wriggle deeper into the crevice. It's quiet for a while, but you soon hear the light footsteps of your enemy approaching.

"Man, where is that squishie?", you hear Flowey ask himself. "There's no way they could've gotten far. Maybe a monster splattered 'em? Shoot. Really would've liked to have a seat cushion or snack."
Soon, though, he hears your whimpers close by, causing a smirk to form on his face. He's found his toy. He knows you're nearby, but Flowey doesn't know exactly where. Somehow, he's going to have to lure you out. "Hmm... let's see what else this body can do..."

As you cower in your cramped shelter, you hear an odd distortion close by. Soon after the distortion stops, you hear much heavier footsteps, though whatever is making them doesn't sound to be too big.

"I... I'm back!", you hear a soft voice cry out. "I'm me again! H-how is this possible? Mom? Dad? Where am I?"

The voice doesn't sound familiar to you, though you swear you've heard that same softness in Toriel's voice. Whatever it is, it clearly isn't Flowey. You decide to squeeze out of your shelter and take a look. It takes you a while to return to your three dimensional shape, but once you do, you see a figure looking up at you.
111.title: Luring out the Squishie

1111.content: "You idiot!" the demonic flower shouts. You don't even have enough time to scream as Flowey turns around and plants his butt right on you. "Ha ha!" He grinds his rear left and right on top of you. He then does rapid butt hops on top of you before grinding into you more. You scream. Your screams are muffled in his massive ass, but he knows you're screaming. "Mm~ it's your own fault for being so comfy," he says as he grinds harder into you. He gives a couple you a couple more butt bounces before he gets back up. "Now, let's see what my freshly pounded Frisk pancake tastes like," he says, rubbing his leafy hands together in anticipation. He turns around to look at his handiwork, only to see his plaything vanished. "What the-? Where-?" he's cut off by a wriggling and screaming into his behind. He looks over at his butt, seeing you still stuck to it. He keels over, laughing at your predicament. "Y'know, I would've finished you off in my stomach, but you look too pathetic to kill." He plops his butt back down on the ground, putting in one more series of grinding. "But you do make for a good cushion. You don't mind if I keep you back there, do you?" You can practically taste the mockery in his voice. You try to scream out as loud as you can, but your pleas disappear into his rump. "I'm not hearing a no." You can only let out a defeated sob as Flowey walks off to who knows where, for you to live out your role as a flower's chair. Fed up with the noise you're making, Flowey decides to give his ass, and you by extension, a smack.
1111.title: You fall for his trap. (Squashed by Flowey.)

1112.content:
"You idiot!" Flowey shouted. Before you could scream, he clamped his mouth around you, stuffing your head into his maw. He started to slurp you up, forcing you all the way into his mouth. He started to chew on your body, making you thankful you were gooey so you wouldn't have to feel the pain of a flower's teeth chewing you up. He started to stroke his cheek, thinking up something.

"I could swallow you up right here, but then again..." he said. You felt his voice vibrate around you and his sappy saliva slathering you. "...doesn't this seem a bit boring? I could swallow you down right now, or I could see what other food I can make you into. I could squash you down into a little pancake, squeeze you as thing as a noodle, something like that..." He kept stroking his chin, you shivering as he thought about what to do to you.
1112.title: You fall for his trap. (Shoved into Flowey'...

11121.content:
Flowey grinned as you struggled in his maw. "I think I got the perfect way to prepare my meal...", he said with wicked glee. Flowey chewed you up a bit more and faced backward and spat you down on the ground behind him, splattering your gooey form as you landed. The impact of the fall into the ground had knocked you silly for a few moments an when you finally came to your senses, you were greeted with the sight of Flowey's massive butt about to descend upon you. The two plump orbs that were his ass cheeks looked like a pair of squishy green meteors to you and you could do nothing to stop the impact.

The sadistic flower's wide behind fell onto you with a *SQUELCH* as his right butt cheek squashed your tiny chewed up body flat! Flowey laughed as he lifted his rear up off of you, only to slam it back down over and over again. Each time he landed, it felt like you were being slapped in the face by a whale. After around half a minute, Flowey stood up. "I think that's enough. Don't wanna turn my pancake into paste", he laughed as he looked back behind him. He had expected to see a crater with his toy's face at the center, but found you were stuck onto his butt cheek like a sticker. "Clingy little guy, aren't ya?", he laughed as he slapped his butt and causing you to wobble along with his jiggly green flesh.

Rather than peel you off, Flowey walked off for a short while with you still stuck, jiggling and moving perfectly along with his flesh with each step before coming to a stop. "Good thing that gullible skeleton left out this plate and cutlery out. Now I can eat my little pancake properly."

You sobbed into the squishy green butt cheek before Flowey peeled you off and slapped you onto the plate. He grabbed the fork and knife and licked his lips as he looked down at his victim. Now just a flesh-colored disk with a young human's face, the only thing you could do was hope that an outside force intervened to prevent Flowey from making you his meal.

11131.content:
Your face pulled off with a small pop causing another giggle to emit from the stranger. You face was pushed into theirs greeting you with an all too familar face. It was your own face but with slightly different features and skin tone from your own, you couldn't utter an word of surprise at the doppelganger. Your twin giggled even harder at your reaction and began licking at your face. "Surprised, partner." Your twin squished you harder against their body and smiled even harder.

You tried to pull away but with your weak body it was simply too impossible. "Who are you and stop licking my face?! " You cried disgusted some stranger was licking your face even if they look almost exactly like you. "Wow you really did forget about me this time. Mmm, cinnamon. I'll allow you to remember me now. Now think carefully where you saw this cute face other than your own." They stretched your face apart hard and slapped it back together, throwing you back onto the ground."

You glared up at them and tried to think carefully about how you would have a twin. You close your eyes and tried to think of the numerous resets and endings you earn which caused you to meet your twin. You could remember all now grabbing the knife in mom's kitchen that voice of identical stranger coaching you on to kill with no remorse until Sans. No, no, no this is bad, this is horrible it's it's..

" Yep, it's me Chara. Your best, true, and only friend." They climbed uptop your chest surprisingly not squishing you weak body flat."Now I know what you're wondering. What are they doing here? They can't get a physical body like Asriel. Welp that's your fault Frisk and do you know why."

You blinked away tears as you felt pain beginning to surge throughout your body. Your body was beginning to squish down but the pain you hadn't felt before was coming down on you realistically. Chara sighed and the pain in your body disappeared being replaced by the usual feeling of being squished down. "You used my own move against me. Remember the sit and wait deal until the victim has to agree to your terms. It's amazing with what could be amounted to thousands of years my happy endings being ruined by you pulling my own move against me." Suddenly they stood up and slam their ass down hard on you. They stood up and did it again and again until they could hardly breath resting on top your squished body."You gave the perfect idea to take the souls of the humans and a couple of monsters our selves for our own fun. Why even get the possibility to get our brother back and separate that stupid flower from him. Oh just imagine the fun we could have had teaching little Asriel to enjoy killing and stop being such a baby but no you had to have a heart huh. When you took the souls I could have my own body but you refused to make me one and share the souls until I promised I wouldn't kill without your permission. Naturally I agreed, for a chance to have fun with ultimate power."

"Please stop." You whimpered under as their butt raised off you. Chara looked down at your squished body and laughed at the ass print imprinted on your body. They snatched you into their hands and began rolling you into a ball showing off their 'nightmare' face you remember they used to remind you of your deals together. With little fanfare you was popped into their mouth and they continue their speech ignoring your begging and pleading simply chewing you like bubble gum. "But I notice something during one of the resets was that whenever you wanted to hurt someone or began to wonder back to killing, or even a slight lost of determination that my promise couldn't be held down on me. With that I learned how to torment people while not killing or hurting them with our powers, and how to make someone else do the job I want."

You felt Chara's slimy tongue poke a small hole into your body and felt yourslef being blown into a bubble and until you was out their mouth and being sucked back in again. You could only wiggle slightly from the uncomfortable feeling Chara saliva was giving you. You were being wiggled back and forth on his tongue until you were finally spat out onto the ground. "You see I need you to lose your determination completely ir else give me permission to kill for eternity. Trust me I've changed over the runs but I simply enjoy tormenting and killing others too much. So how about giving me permission with actually 'meaning' it buddy. Or should I restart your eternal torment again." Suddenly a flash of images run through your head of being tormented by everyone in the Underground and up above both intentionally and unintentionally till you either died through the various circustances Chara put you through other than the current one you face now.

Your body was still reforming but it was healed enough for your lips to reappear despite rest of your body uncurling from it's ball shape. "No I won't do it! You might as keep at it, I'll get out of this eventually!" If what they were saying is true then you're literally the only thing that protecting the world from destruction. You was already dumb enough to give this sociopath the power to change the world with an drop of an hat if they wanted. You giving them back their abiltiy to kill would have made your actions nonsense, if you had to suffer then fine this is your redemption for ruining so many happy endings.

Chara looked down at you and chuckled in amusement before tossing you into their mouth and walking off. "Like I said before and say again. Since when were you in charge." Their eyes turned into huge black holes and their insane laughter filled the air. "So many possibilities on how to torment you this time. Should I take over your place and shake things up a little and annoy that fat ass flower, or should I stay here and torment you until mom comes and finds me or til I get bored.." Decisions, Decisions."

Your savior turned out to be goatmom herself who had rushed to your aid and accidentally flattened your face across her bosom. Toriel asked as she scowled at the flower and took heavy footsteps towards it before it was to late for flowey and he was stomped under her huge fuzzy feet. 11133.title: Other

112.content:
The next thing you see is Flowey throwing himself butt first at you. You manage to avoid the attack by running behind you, and decide your safest bet is to go for one of the nicest monsters you met, as well as one of the nicest monsters in your general direction as you head towards the door you used to exit the ruins. You try your hardest to pull the door open, but in doing so, you realize your fingers are squeezing through the crack. If you can't open the door, you decided you'd use your new founded malleable form to force your way through the door. You find yourself half way through the crack, when you feel a certain flower pull on your leg.
"Where ya goin' 'friend?' You think that old goat is going to save you this time?" Flowey asks. "You idiot! You walked out on her and she shut you out. Why would she possibly take you in after you betrayed her?" He tugs on you, only to realize he isn't really pulling you towards him. Instead he's stretching out your limb, as if he were needing a noodle. "Hm," he ponders as he strokes his chin.
You pull yourself through the door, your leg being the only thing not with you. You try to pull your leg through, only to find that your leg just extends without pulling your foot towards you. Suddenly, you feel your foot enter a small, sappy, opening dotted with what feels like seeds. Suddenly, to your horror, you feel that sappy opening suck your extended leg, and it seems as though it was pulling the rest of your body. Flowey was trying to suck up your body like a noodle strand.
112.title: Seek safety with Toriel.

1121.content:
You don't know how, but you manage to finally pull your leg, hard enough to hear Flowey slam face first into the door with a "gong." You unintentionally laugh at this. As you let out your laugh, you realize: he's out there, you're near the nicest person you met... you're safe. You blow a raspberry at Flowey through the door while he's shaking the cobwebs out of his head.

"Ya, yuk it up all you want! You're no more safer with giga goat in there than you are with me out here! You'll see! In fact, you're gonna be beggin' to be plastered to this rear!" You figure he's just upset he lost and you walk off, grinning and with a spring in your steps. You walk up the steps, head to the living room, only to find she's not rocking in it. Where is she?
1121.title: You escape

choices: Flowey found a way into the ruins
11211.content: You figured Toriel might be tending to the flowerbed you fell on when you first got here. You figured that, since you escaped Flowey, you could survive anything now.
