14.content: While examining yourself, you catch a whiff of something. Something that instantly makes your mouth water. Your eyelids droop at the smell, imagining sinking your teeth into it. After sniffing around a little, you realize that smell's coming from you! You're salivating at your own meat! After shaking off that shock, you worry whether or not other monsters smell you like this. You don't want Flowey to find out. You know Toriel would protect you (Right?), but you left her home, much to her sorrow. Undyne still despises people like you, so going near her is more likely to hurt you. Then there's Alphys, she seems perfectly harmless, but I everything else in Hotland harmless?
14.title: You smell delicious!

142.content:
As it stands right now you cannot continue in your adventure. Anything would snatch you up and then it would be all over, you would be fat on some monster. But it is more than that. Your mind has flashbacks of horrible visions of whst might happen if human and monster SOULS merged. No, you cannot go on. So you go back. You know Toriel will protect you. You know you will be safe here. So you return to the Ruins, return Home.

As you go, Flowey watches and his jaw drops. Shaking his head in anguish he finally sighs.

"Great. Lots of fun to be seen and I wont get to see it. Worst idea ever." He sighs and looks out to the frozen world. "Maybe Smiley Trashbag is doing something fun..."

**********

Toriel's sobs fill the air. She can recall the human leaving. Somehow she can. And yet she knows when she went to see the human there was nothing there. So she sat in her room with those memories. Thwt was the sight you saw as she sat on her bed, holding an old yellow and green shirt.

"Mom." You say. Toriel looks up and you smile. And she smiles.

And then she looks confused as she loicks her chops. Oh NO.

"Child..... why am I smelling fresh baked pie?" She asked. "And.... why is it so strong when I am newr you..... like I have to take a taste. "

You go to answer but eep as she licks your forehead.She seems to sway wjth delight.

This may be the only chance you get to run. You can bolt and hope for the best.

Or..... do you trust Toriel?
142.title: You run to Toriel's

1422.content:
"Mom?" You ask, a little worried, but, if you knew Toriel, a little smell wasn't going to make her do something as drastic as eat you, "What are you doing? it's me!"

You wait patiently as you hope Toriel would snap out of it.
1422.title: Mom? What are you doing?

choices: Toriel snaps out of the daze and feels apologetic
14221.content:
Unfortunately, you were wrong. Toriel grabbed your ankle, and pulled it up into the air. You were left dangling in the air, held up only by her large hand. You tried to reach up and pry open her grip, but she was too strong for you. She lifted you up to her hungry grin. She brought your face close to her maw, and licked your face. You squirmed as you felt her saliva slather you, and tried to push yourself away from her.

"Mmm, tastier than a snail," Toriel said, licking her lips. She lifted you overhead, and opened her maw wide. Before you could even scream, she let go of you, letting you fall towards her awaiting mouth. Her lips snapped around you, stopping just at your waist, dangling inches away from her throat. She used that moment to lick you all over a little more, the sounds of her content "mmm"s radiating all around you. You were crying. Of all the people that'd want to eat you, why'd it have to be Toriel?

She parted her lips, and let you fall towards her throat. In little time, you felt the entirety of your body get squeezed by her monstrous throat as it pulled you, in tandem with gravity, down into her awaiting stomach. You cried even more as you approached the sweet monster's insides. The narrow tube you squeezed down quickly opened up into her stomach, and you fell in with a plop.

"Ahhh," Toriel sighed. She patted her stomach contently, shaking you up in the process. "So, so tasty," she commented. You, meanwhile, pounded against her stomach walls, begging to be released.
14221.title: She's too mesmerized

142211.content:
Toriel rubs over her belly smiling but that smile soon fades as your smell dissapeared and she came back to her senses.

"My child? Oh no my child. I didn't mean to do this. It's just that, you smelled so wonderfull." She says rubving over her belly to try and calm you down.

It did work as you don't feel fear anymore. You then ask her to let you back out. She starts doing so but then thinks a bit. "Actually." She says. "It might be better if you stay in there for now untill we find a way to get that delicious smell away from you." She says mouth watering a bit.

You protest a little but then she replies. "I might lose control again and eat you yet again while not breaking out of that trance again. I'll leave it up to you however. You can stay safely inside my belly or go back out."

What do you choose?
142211.title: Toriel's sadness.

choices: Reading her books for a possible solution.
1422111.content:
As you sit in Toriel's stomach you feel more calm and find it very soft and comfortable. You say to her that you're ok with staying in her belly for now.

Toriel rubs her belly and smiles. "Alright my child, have gun inside of me." She says and goes to the kitchen to cook something. After a few minutes a bag drops inside and you see food inside before she speaks up. "I can't let you go hungry in there now can I?" You giggle from that and rub around a bit before you start eating.

After that you both chat a little before her stomach shakes as she yawns. "Sorry my child but it's kinda late. Have a good night's sleep in my tummy." Toriel says before going to her bed and falling asleep and you do too later on.

In the morning when you both wake up and have breakfast (Toriel swallowed another bag for that.). Toriel starts thinking about helping you out.

How will she try?
1422111.title: Inside the goatmom.

choices: Week stay in the goatmom hotel.
14221111.content:
"I think my there's something in my books about this." Toriel says and looks through her bookshelf, picking up a few before sitting in her chair and starts reading while rubbing over you in her belly.

As you sit there and hear her read you kinda wished you could've helped but there's not enough light in her stomach for you to read books. That and the pages would get wet too quickly.
As time passes on for a few hours she suddenly sounds surprised making you ask. "Did you find something?"
She rubs over you in her belly and responds. "I think so yes. This says that hunger inducing smells can be neutralized by doing this.
You smile and rub her stomach walls. "Great, what's it gonna be?"



A: A bath and Toriel decides to have one with you.
B: Staying a week inside her belly.
14221111.title: Reading her books for a possible solution.

142211111.content:
"Well my child, this book here says that a bath would help you out. I'ts been a while since I had one as well so I think I'll join you in one." Toriel says and you blush madly.
"Can't I have one on my own?" You ask but suddenly you're feeling yourself pulled into her intestines. "Since we're gonna be cleaning ourselves there shouldn't be an issue for you coming out of my butt my child." Toriel says laughing and patting the bulge.

You wanted to complain but it's too cramped as you're moving through her body. You do hear water running as well as her humming as she undresses. After a while longer you come to a halt and Toriel shakes her hips a bit. "How is it in my butt?" She asks and you feel around and come to the conclusion it's rather nice. t's really soft, doesn't smell bad and all by all not too cramped either.

Then you hear her step in and she pushes you out making you fall into the water. You glow red as you see her standing naked in front of you and she smiles to you. "Don't worry my child, your problem will be gone soon." She says and helps you remove your clothes before hugging you against her. You can smell she perfumed the bath so that she wouldn't lose control which makes you feel safer.

Toriel then asks. "How about we wash eachother?"

Do you agree?
142211111.title: Bath time with Toriel.

choices: One of you thinks of some way to make your smell before it's too late
Toriel begins to lose control once more
14222.content:
"Oh, my my my! What am I doing!" exclaimed Toriel, "No, no, no, no, this isn't right at all. I'm sorry, my child, I just don't know what came over me."

You tell her it's ok, and you explain what Flowey did to you.

"Oh you poor child! It was a mistake to ever let you leave the ruins!" she explained, "But you smell just like snails and butterscotch! How delicious! We must do something about this at once! We have to mask your sent before other monsters start coming along. Or worse, I start losing control of myself again..."

You then here Toriel's stomach growling, and Toriel quickly covers her belly with her arms. You feel like you should think of something really quick, before Toriel changes her mind again...
14222.title: she snaps out of it

choices: Toriel finally pays attention to your cries and lets you out
Toriel falls asleep with you inside her
142222.content:
“But your smell is so great and strong... and your wonderful taste...” Toriel said, licking her lips. “Never mind, I must have you!”

And with that, Toriel pinned you to the ground and started licking you. Terrified, you just lay there while she does her thing, licking every last part of your body, even putting your head in her mouth and sucking on it like a lollipop. Once she finished tasting you, she put your legs in her mouth and slowly drags you in. You try to yell out to her to make her snap out of it, but she doesn’t listen to your cries. After one final gulp, you are sent into her stomach. You keep yelling, but to no avail.
142222.title: Toriel begins to lose control once more

choices: ...a spider, probably collecting ingredients for Muffet
145.content: Before you can decide on anything, you hear something sniffing you. You swear you hear them licking their lips. You turn around and see...
145.title: Some other monster finds you

choices: Time runs out, Muffet can do what she wants with you
1451.content:
You jump in shock upon seeing a spider inspecting your body. As you back up, you feel a bunch of other fuzzy beings tap on to your back. You turn around and see a bunch of other spiders. To your horror, they leap onto you. They skitter across your body, wrapping you up in their web all the while. Despite your struggles, they manage to wrap everything from your shoulders to your knees in web, causing you to flop over, unable to move your arms an inch. The spiders then each attach another strand to the webbing wrapped around you. They then crawl away, dragging you kicking and screaming in defiance.

You're dragged through Hotland, and you swear that scent you're emanating smells a lot more hotdog-y than when you first started smelling that way. The spiders finally drag you up to a familiar cave with cobwebs spread about the entry like curtains. The spiders drag you through the entry, covering you up in more and more cobwebs as they pull you across the floor. Eventually, they separate themselves from you, leaving you wrapped up and on the floor in the middle of a dark, spider infested cave. You hear something sniffing in the darkness.

"Ahuhuhu~ What have my darlings brought me?" you hear a familiar voice. You look to the source, horrified, as you see a pair- no, two pairs- no, five eyes pierce the darkness of the cave. Light suddenly shines down, revealing a spider like monster, boasting six arms, two legs, her five eyes, and a cutesy red outfit. The spiders brought before Muffet, the spider girl running a bake sale to move out all of her spider friends in the ruins. If only she didn't price her pastries so much. ...The fact that spiders have been handling them may factor into it as well.

Muffet sniffs the air again, her eye fluttering at your succulent scent. "Oh my~ I don't remember the last time my darling brought me something this delicious~ And how lovely of them, already wrapping you up in a sider donut for me." You shake even more at this. But your struggles are for not. Muffet hoists you bridal style, walking over to the desk of her bake sale. She places you at center on the table. You watch her write on the sign, and then take out an hourglass before putting it on the table next to you. You crane your neck to look at the sign, reading what she just wrote.

New special: Hotdog in a spider blanket! Sells for 9999G! Offer ends when hourglass empties!
1451.title: ...a spider, probably collecting ingredients fo...

14512.content:
You wait for the hourglass to run out, which honestly felt like days, or even weeks. Yet, finally. You saw the last of the time run out.

"Oh Dear," Muffet chimes with a grin, "It seems you're time has run out"

She picked you right up and carried you over, placing you in a mat with all the other donuts and pastries that didn't sell all day.

"Well, as customary," Muffet grinned, "All baked goods that aren't sold by the end of the day..."
14512.title: At the Mercy of Muffet

choices: The edge of Hotland (into the lava)
145122.content:
"...must be disposed of" Muffet said with finality.

Disposed of ?! As in, 'thrown away'? You frantically struggle against the webbing to no avail as Muffet picks up the sides of the mat , trapping you and the goods in, before you were dropped right into a rather large trash can.

"Sorry I have to do this, but I can't have my customers taking any stale products, now can i?"

You could only watch through the hole at the top of the can as Muffet lifted it up and took it over to....
145122.title: Trashed!

choices: You managed not to fall out
Nope. Into the lava you go.
1451222.content:
You start the wonder where the spider was taking you along with all the unpurchased goods. You never thought about what she did with them. You didn't have much time to think though, as the quiet thumbs you could hear and feel came to a halt as Muffet stopped walking

You look up through the trash can. It's pretty clear you were still in Hotland, given the sky. You then felt the can was being lifted up. You started to wonder what was going on now, until what you saw made your blood run cold. Out of the hole, you could see the boiling lava that surrounded Hotland, some old donuts falling out before they were incinerated into nothing

With almost all of your effort, you inch your way to the back of the can like a worm, feeling dread wash over you. You started to think you were safe, until a loud bang came out, as you and a few other pastries began sliding toward the edge into the fiery abyss. And then came another. Muffet was repeatedly banging on the bottom of the can to get every last doughnut out.

You struggle to inch your way back up, as each bang only brought you closer to the pit of lava lying below you. You struggled with the last of your energy to get out the web the spiders have strung on you.
1451222.title: The edge of Hotland (into the lava)

14512222.content:
You struggled with all of your might, but it wasn't enough. The web let go of you, making you fall towards your doom. You quickly looked up to see Muffet smiling at you. You didn't get to scream or anything as you immediately plunged into the lava, burning instantly. Your soul didn't last long as it shattered away quickly. A delicious smell came from the smoke that rose from the burning ashes. Muffet smelled it and giggled.

"Teehee, even when the human is gone, they smell tasty." Muffet left giving you little thought afterwords. Toriel never learned what happened to you.
14512222.title: The Spider did lava you after all

choices: The Monster Kid finds you. (most likely safe)
You don't wait to find out who it is. Run for it!
15.content: You could feel your heart thumping in your chest, as you could hear the footsteps of someone nearby. Curling up into a tight ball inside the flower patch, you sweat and shook in terror. Your determination having been drained has left you as a quivering little coward! You felt as if you would be too afraid to say no to whatever the next monster you came across would tell you to do! You felt your eyes widen in horror, as something began to part the flower patch to reveal that....
15.title: Pathetic little idiot!

152.content:
You look up and see Undyne! "sup nerd" undyne says. you tell her that you were being chased by flowey, but when you look over your shoulder you see flowey running away not wanting to confront undyne. "c'mon kid, lets get you some place safe" Undyne says.
Where will she be taking you?
152.title: You are found by Undyne!

choices: Alphys says "I want to run some tests on you to find out what Flowey did to you"
Undyne says "We need you to help us out with something"
1521.content:
Undyne hikes you up over her shoulders and sprints at the speed of sound towards Alphys' laboratory. Undyne knocks on the door, before deciding to kick it in herself a few seconds after. The door swings inches from Alphys' face.

Alphys shrugs it off then says "H- Hey there Undyne! O-oh, and h- hello there Frisk! What brings you two here?"

Undyne runs past Alphys, slamming the door behind her, and places Frisk on the ground in front of them. "The little guy here just had a close encounter with Flowey. Tell me twerp, did that pathetic excuse for a flower do anything to harm ya?"

"I don't feel any different" exclaimed Frisk.

"U- Um... Undyne? Can I... Uh... speak with you in the other room for a second?" Asks Alphys.

"Uh, sure. You wait right here, nerd. And if Flowey comes back, shout for me. I'll squash him like the weed he is." Replies Undyne.

Undyne, led by Alphys, walk over to the next room over, and they both disappear around the corner. Frisk is left by himself, unsure of what to do. Checking himself over again, he still can't tell what Flowey did. He looks in a mirror, and all he sees is some red ink over his eye from when sans pulled a prank on him. He pats his head, and the only thing he finds is some snow. Checking his inventory, he finds a spider donut, a stick, a piece of a snow man, and an annoying dog. He just can't seem to figure out what's wrong with him.

After a little bit, Alphys and Undyne re-enter the room. Standing side by side, they both look at you. They look a little nervous knowing what they have to tell you. What is it?
1521.title: To the Laboratory

155.content: You can't bear to find out who it is, you have to get out of here, ASAP. You quickly run to...
155.title: You don't wait to find out who it is. Run f...

1551.content: You quickly make your way out of Waterfall and find yourself back at the door you came from to enter Snowdin. Immediately, you try pulling open the door, but without success, then remembering that the door was locked to anyone, you try desperately banging on the door. Hoping, that, just maybe, someone will open the door and let you in.
1551.title: Toriel's

choices: Her chair, to comfort you some more
Your room, so you could take a (much needed) rest
15511.content:
After what feel like hours of knocking, you finally see the door creak open, as you saw the tall goat-lady open the door. Almost by instinct, you run up and gave her a hug, glad to know you found a monster who dosen't want to hurt you.

"My child? I thought I told you..." She didn't respond as she saw you whimpering and shivering like you saw your worst nightmare incarnate.

The goat lady slowly went down to your level and wrapped her arms around your shivering body in a warm, comforting hug. You slowly calm down as you feel her warm, furry arms wrap around you as her hands gently pet your back in slow, repetitive strokes.

You give a little smile as the motherly goat picks you up. "Don't worry, my child. This isn't your fault. It's mine. I should have never let you venture outside the ruins.", she said with finality before closing the large doors once again.

Soon, you were brought back upstairs as she carried you to...
15511.title: She finally hears the knocking

155112.content:
Toriel went over to your room, set you in your bed, tucked you in and gave you a kiss on the forehead with a sweet, "Goodnight, my child"

Given just how comfy the bed of the room Toriel gave you was, it wasn't long before you dozed off happily.

You start to wake a little later. The first thing you heard was the sound of something being ripped off with a loud metallic noise coming from downstairs. It wasn't long before you heard a second one. You were starting to get worried. Was that Flowey? Someone breaking in? You quickly hop out of the bed and peek through the door, only to find what really was making that noise.

Outside, you saw Toriel holding two metal objects. Just from looking at them, you could tell what they were: the handles for the door.

In other words, your one way out of the ruins to the rest of the underground was long gone now.

Looking back, you also notice a small slice of butterscotch, cinnamon pie. Knowing just how great it was, you decide to pick up the peice, before sitting down to think of your next course of action.
155112.title: Your room, so you could take a (much needed) rest

info.brief_description: Our young protagonist has an odd ailment, making the underground much more dangerous.
info.description:
Flowey has ambushed Frisk and given them an odd ailment, in addition to gaining control over the timeline. Will our young hero's determination win out this time?

Edit 6/6/17: I've added a section to play with Toriel, too.
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2066726-Undertail-Fetish-Fun-wFris...

Things not allowed:
gore/ hard vore
heavy gas/ toilet stuff (full-tour vore, though, is encouraged)
I'm pretty wishy washy on things involving dudes, so PM me your idea before putting dudes in there. (I understand that the first chapter already violates this rule.)
[Edit 5/18/17: The list of characters I don't allow is actually pretty short. PM me if you want the full list]

Things allowed:
basically everything else

Rules:

1) This story is in the main character's POV. Frisk's gender isn't established in the game. As such, their gender will remain a mystery unless it's required for the chapter (same goes for Chara).

2) You don't have to necessarily go through the locations in order.

3) Be sure to use proper grammar and spelling.

4) Make chapters more than one sentence.

5) Limit the choices. After things get to two paths, it's decision time. Don't add infinite choices, either.

6) NO PLAGIARISM. DO NOT COPY SOMEONE ELSE'S WORK AND PASTE IT IN HERE. DO NOT COPY MINE OR ANY CONTRIBUTOR'S STUFF. (you know who you are)

I'm open to suggestions if you have any ideas, but are unsure of your own writing ability. It may be a while before I get to it, if at all, though.
